articles.author: Zavier Ong
articles.title: Forget big cap stocks. Bank of America's top small-and-mid cap stocks - CNBC
articles.description: Much of the market's focus has been on big-cap stocks, but BOA sees opportunity in small- and mid-cap stocks that could hedge against inflation and a recession.
